website_summaries.verdict: If you need cookies and you have food allergies, this brand is a good bet.
pros: In addition to no gluten, these cookies also include no tree nuts, egg, wheat, soy, sesame, sulfates, casein, potato, peanuts, or dairy
cons: Not a ton in a box, so they are pricier than regular cookies

customer_reviews.title: WHAT HAPPENED?!?
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered,"Enjoy Life Soft Baked Cookies,"numerous times&really enjoyed them. It had been a while so,I ordered the 6 box variety pack.Was I in for a shock!What in the world happened??They're under half the size of the same cookies I had previously ordered.There was absolutely no flavor,taste was a blob of dried out dough!! Always loved Snickerdoodle's, very disappointed!These are not@all the same cookies I previously loved.Won't be ordering again! Now,I have 5 boxes of unopened cookies. These were not cheap!When you expect the same product that you previously enjoyed&end up w/these,I feel mislead.Hate wasting food&really hate wasting my money!!There's no one I would even consider giving these to.Would still like to know,what happened?!?
customer_reviews.author: Bikegirl

customer_reviews.title: Allergy Alert—ingredients have been changed!!
customer_reviews.text: These cookies used to be great for my allergic child as they came in very handy for a pre-made treat. However, Enjoy Life has changed the ingredients in the double chocolate brownie cookies adding konjac and sorghum flours. My child is allergic to konjac and had an allergic reaction after eating one of these cookies from the newly redesigned boxes. Please be aware that it’s not just the photo on the box that’s changed, ingredients have been changed as well with no notice of said ingredient changes on the new design. This is disappointing and unacceptable from a company that is supposed to be attuned to the needs of the allergy community.
customer_reviews.author: mommySweetie

customer_reviews.title: New Funny taste - must have changed something
customer_reviews.text: We are SO disappointed, these had been my son’s favorite cookies. He has multiple food allergies and cannot eat many prepared foods. EnjoyLife must have changed something because he tastes a difference and does not like them anymore (I can even smell a difference. We used to order several cases at a time. Now I am stuck w/ 4 cases of them as they can no longer be returned. Such a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: lake monster

customer_reviews.title: I am amazed
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely delicious! Every flavor is good. They are the perfect treat for my gluten, dairy and soy free diet. My favorite is the nice spicy gingerbread. These are soft cookies that remind me of the tops of muffins by their shape. They are about the size of a golf ball. Two cookies of any flavor are 120 calories. They didn't leave me feeling bloated like a snack containing gluten would and they're wonderful dipped in tea. I got the variety bundle. There are 12 cookies in each box.
customer_reviews.author: Meatbomb

customer_reviews.title: not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: I"m always looking for a good vegan chocolate chip cookie, so when these were recommended by a vegan website, I ordered the 6 boxes (minimum order). They are not really good at all and don't taste like good choc. chip cookies, now I am stuck with 5 boxes, which i will give away after the pandemic lets up, but I can't recommend these. Also, they are packaged in way too much plastic, each cookie in an individual plastic mold, horrible!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Simply delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful fresh texture, great bargain. I'm an essential worker, and I wanted to bring treats for my co-workers, but didn't feel like battling the store. I ordered these, and once they finally got here, boy, are they ever delicious! Absolute five stars!
customer_reviews.author: amybeth7

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase these cookies
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product. I purchased them for my church coffee hour as a gluten free option. They were hard as rocks and had a stale taste. They were delivered on 2-27-20. I failed to check the "best by" date and simply put the boxes on the shelf in the church pantry. Kitchen hosts were not serving them. None of the hosts said anything. Yesterday I was at church, saw the cookies were not being served, ate one and checked the "best by" date. It is 3-30-2020. I will not purchase this product again. I had to throw away 5 1/2 boxes. Not a good use of church funds.
customer_reviews.author: marjorie lell

customer_reviews.title: Great cookies, fun to sample the variety of flavors
customer_reviews.text: These cookies are delicious. Anyone that has major food allergies, this will be your new go to! My favorite are the snickerdoodle and chocolate chip. I didn’t care for the double chocolate as much, but everyone has their own preference. I bought the variety pack because I also wanted to try the gingerbread flavor which is hard to find or is super expensive. Those were very yummy too. Purchasing the variety pack was a nice way to sample them all and find my favorites. The cookies are a small size which makes it good for portioning...or giving yourself and excuse to eat multiples!
customer_reviews.author: B.mara

customer_reviews.title: How did this get rated so high?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure these can be called cookies. First of the packaging is the first give away, why did they individually segregate the cookies in its own compartment? The product doesn't seem to be baked all the way through and tastes more doughy. I tried all of the flavors and the best is gingerbread, followed by the snickerdoodle. I would stay away from the chocolate chip and double c brownie, they are just overpowering sweet. If the gingerbread was sold individually, I might pick that one up, but otherwise, not coming back.
customer_reviews.author: David Peng

customer_reviews.title: New Formulation - I've Been Purchasing For 20+ Years  Locally
customer_reviews.text: The title is true! I ran out of wheat-free cookies and saw this bargain on Amazon and bought it. You can’t beat the price when bought here on Amazon. Have always liked this flavor of EnjoyLife Cookies along with the Snickerdoodle and the former No-Oat Meal Cookies that I used to buy in the late 1990s. About a year ago Enjoy Life changed the packaging and the formulation for all their cookies. The Soft Baked Double Chocolate Chip now are 11g of Sugar per serving instead of 10g. I count my sugar intake and this new formulation is a relatively high sugar and net carb buster! I like the product but will have to cut back on them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Non-GMO Foodie Biker

customer_reviews.title: Toddler's fav cookies
customer_reviews.text: These cookies have been a God-send in making my toddler with multiple food allergies feel "normal." He has never had a bad reaction as these are free of all of his allergies. They get expensive, but this offer saved me quite a bit. Also saves me time if I didn't have any wacky cake or carrot cake with egg-replacer ready for him. I hesitated in purchasing because I feared they would soon expire, but they came with enough time to slowly go through them. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Meems

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfying, gritty feel in mouth
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed by those. Had to switch to a dairy and soy free diet and really struggling with this, particularly since soy lecithin is an issue and in so many things. So these cookies seemed like a great solution. But they don't taste good, somehow "empty" flavor, not sure how to better describe it. And they leave a strange gritty like feel in the mouth. I'm not expecting this to taste like a wheat dairy cookie but I'm missing a feeling of satisfaction and satiety that these do not create.
customer_reviews.author: Schnups

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I’m vegan and gluten free, so these cookies are a nice sweet snack to keep in the house. They’re kind of dry, but not unexpected for gluten free. They are smaller than I expected, but not a big deal. The snickerdoodle and ginger snap are far better than the double chocolate and chocolate chip. The internal packaging could be a little better so they don’t get stale. Good price compared to the few times I’ve seen them in my local grocery stores.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great rare for allergy friendly
customer_reviews.text: We love all of these except the snickerdoodle - not because it’s not soft or fresh or as much like a “real cookie” for my allergic little - but the snickerdoodle is kinda strong. If you love that cookie. Then you will love that flavor. But choc chip is our favorite. Love that it’s safe for everyone one of our allergy friends - the price in this package is excellent too. Like getting two boxes free
customer_reviews.author: Mom6Phil36

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a product targeting some very specific health needs and they have done an amazing job! These cookies taste as good as any other you have ever had, and yet they are made without all the junk! I highly recommend these if you have a need for them, and even if you don't - you are getting a healthier cookie that tastes amazing! These are not calorie-free, so you can't eat as many as you want, but you will feel better about what you are putting in your body! I'm glad these are available to those that need them! I love them because they are healthy and delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Carl C. Anderson, BSN, RN

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT include items that are IN the cookies
customer_reviews.text: They taste great, are healthy for you, but advertise on Amazon without including the ingredients that are in it. I wrongly assumed they did not have sugar, they do. I went back to see how I made this mistake and realized on the 72nd review someone asks about sugar and the response was 'go to our website'. Really? Why bother advertising in Amazon if you can't include all the info there. List the ingredients please.
customer_reviews.author: E,Rappy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for gluten free, bad for lactose intolerant
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has Celiac disease. He cannot have gluten and is also lactose intolerant. The only draw back is that these some of these cookies have milk in them. So, I have 3 boxes of cookies that my grandson cannot have and no one else likes.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and a small treat
customer_reviews.text: I finally have a new "vice" that doesn't make me feel horrible later after indulging. These soft baked cookies are the chocolate goodness I really wanted. They are small in size. Don't be surprised when it says 12 cookies in the package and serving size is two but they look so small, almost as small in diameter as a quarter. However, they are full of flavor and two actually fill me up when I have them with a cup of tea or coffee. I feel that I received plenty for the price that I paid and after I eat more of these I will be ordering another flavor to try so I can alternate. I love these!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Alina

customer_reviews.title: Got expired cookies- chocolate is bad
customer_reviews.text: Package expired and chocolate looks all white and chalky Item cannot be returned
customer_reviews.author: lora

customer_reviews.title: Small but worth it
customer_reviews.text: The cookies were small when I opened the box, and i was really dreading them being so tiny. But once I tasted them I was wowed. They even fill you up! my kids and I could only get about 3 down before we felt happy with it. I LOVE the gingerbread and will definitely get it again. The sampler is lovely cause you get to decide what you like.
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They’re so soft. They are great And tasty. Kinda weird at the beginning cause I’m not used to soft cookies. I’m gluten and lactose/casein intolerant so these are perfect and they don’t make me bloated
customer_reviews.author: Jorge & Brenda

customer_reviews.title: The Best Store Bought Gluten Free/Vegan cookies I have had!
customer_reviews.text: These are so good you will not believe that they are gluten, egg, dairy, nut, and many other allergen FREE! All varieties are delicious. The chocolate chip are soft and chewy and taste like cookie dough. I highly recommend especially for people with special diets - but all will enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ireland

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: My son has terrible allergies to mostly all foods but thank God we found this brand! We first tried it from our local natural food store and loved it. So when I found it on amazon for cheaper, I had to buy it! This is my 2nd time purchasing the brownie one and my son loves it! So do I. We can eat a tray a day lol
customer_reviews.author: Mahina Butler

customer_reviews.title: Good in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: the flavor just wasn't there. I feel like this is what you expect a gluten free cookie to taste like. You do get used to it but it's not the same. Lofty goals for a gluten free cookie but decent. The Snickerdoodle and Gingersnaps were the best of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad..not great...
customer_reviews.text: Their ok...definitely one of the better gluten free soft baked cookies out there..but NO WHERE Near as good as WoW Baking Company's Soft baked cookies..Wow's are better than most gluten cookies... The only edge Enjoy life has for me is their easy to find and get a hold of..the cookies are ok but after the all seemed to taste the same the Chocolate chip and the snickerdoodle tasted the same in a way except for the differences in Chocolate and cinnamon... Not bad but not great... if your not picky and need a decent gluten free cookie this is it :)
customer_reviews.author: Why

customer_reviews.title: They're surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.text: I went through these little cookies far faster than I ever expected to. They were great, despite the fact that I accidentally ordered the wrong type. I had wanted gingerbread so badly, I was really craving gingerbread cookies but, instead, I got chocolate chip by accident. Despite that the chips were chocolaty, the cookies were soft, and it was overall pretty fantastic. I hope to have the excess money I had when I bought these to try their gingerbread cookies some day!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Z.

customer_reviews.title: I am gluten intolerant, love these little cake like cookies
customer_reviews.text: Love chocolate chip & double chocolate chip brownie!!! Snickerdoodle is too spiced-gingerbread ish. Love how soft they are, like little cakes, Rich in flavor- I can’t eat too many so that’s a good thing. Won’t order combo box BUT definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Raphaele Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Love these cookies so much. It is not easy to find a soft gluten free cookies. To save myself from eating the entire package of 12, I have to put them away. I recommend them and will buy them again and again (I make gluten free small ice cream sandwiches out of them too).
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I have been GF for over two years now and in that time, I've tried a LOT of cookies. These have a weird aftertaste to them and I wish they had a little bit of a texture to them like a nut or something. The softness makes me feel like I'm eating soft napkins.
customer_reviews.author: Cbman

customer_reviews.title: snickerdoodle for the win!
customer_reviews.text: Great vegan cookies. They're great with coffee, or even your favorite soda. My favorite is the snickerdoodle! They taste just like trader j's vegan snickerdoodles, only not as expensive! The chocolate chip is a decent 2nd place flavor. The double chocolate brownie was too rich in flavor for me and didn't taste like a brownie to be honest. The gingerbread wasn't good at all. I highly recommend the variety pack so you can taste all of them and decide which ones you like the best for yourself. I'm vegan so these are a godsend for when I'm craving a cookie to snack on.
customer_reviews.author: C. Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, not a lot of cookies
customer_reviews.text: The double chocolate cookie is definitely the best. Snickerdoodle tastes similar to a gingersnap, but I like it a lot. The texture is soft and makes it easy to eat a whole box in one sitting. However, the cookies are small and there aren't many of them in the box. I'm not sure if it was wort $20.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Cookies freshness date will expire long before 6 boxes can be eaten.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a case of 6 boxes and the experation date on all 6 boxes is in 10 days. A case will last much longer than that and should have a longer experation date. I wont order by the case again. The price is the same if I buy single boxes.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Best Allergy Friendly Cookies for Potlucks and Gifts!
customer_reviews.text: They are chewy and hold together great. Tastes just like a pre bought non allergy friendly cookie! Definitely something to keep in the pantry for cravings. Last a long time out of the freezer. No need to freeze. Go to for potlucks if you have to buy allergy friendly with no experience. Recommended to anyone who asks what they should buy for someone as a thank you. Each cookie is about the size of your fingers making the OK sign.
customer_reviews.author: Liberti Lucas

customer_reviews.title: So Delicious, good price too
customer_reviews.text: These cookies are fabulous! Flavors are spot on. Super delicious, soft, and good ingredients. I wish they were bigger, as other reviews have mentioned, but that's the only downside. I have a wheat allergy, and these are a perfect treat for me! The other nice thing is that buying them in bulk you get a much better deal; when you buy these at the store individually they are pretty pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Emmons

customer_reviews.title: Great cookies for a great price
customer_reviews.text: My son has food allergies and these are one of the few brands he can have. He absolutely loves these cookies and they're hard to find in the stores a lot of times. Buying it this way is a better value as well. This will definitely be a repeat purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great GF Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: These cookies are really good! I definitely liked them more than my boyfriend. I really wish they were packaged in little bags though. They're packaged like oreos or chips ahoy cookies with no way to re-seal the box. I have to put them in little sandwich bags to keep them fresh once opened
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Fage

customer_reviews.title: Great allergen free option
customer_reviews.text: We have this on a subscription order and will continue to do so. Our kid loves them and we love them bc they’re something he can actually eat. He’s allergic to everything so we bring them with us to parties (when they existed) and outings.
customer_reviews.author: Amy reviews it all

customer_reviews.title: Allergy Free!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I learned last year that I have food allergies and it has been so hard to find food I can eat!!! I have 4 food allergies (milk, egg, soy and wheat) and these cookies cut out all of those! I can really enjoy eating again!
customer_reviews.author: kitty20

customer_reviews.title: KIDS LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: We went on a Disney cruise and were offered these gluten-free cookies, so ever since they have been known in our house as "cruise cookies". The less discriminating palates in our house LOVE these cookies, and that's really what matters. Personally, I don't find them worth the calories.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDenizen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t just a book by its cover !
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son during the holidays to have a treat for him as he is 100% vegan. He left to go back home and left them here. I am not a vegan and was craving something sweet so I tried one and honestly couldn’t stop. Amazing flavor!! Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Boy mom

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Allergies
customer_reviews.text: My son is allergic to eggs, soy, dairy, wheat, peanuts, seafoods and this are just the major ones here I listed, because there are more. In short, he was able to eat this okay. Thanks, my 3 y/o was able to eat something good without worrying. Of course I check the ingredients listed too and I have his medications at home as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cannary

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t recommend buying from this distributor . Recieved cookies and chocolate on the cookie was old. I’ve bought this brand at grocery store and they are good but don’t buy from this distributor
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: Winning!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious but pricey. If you buy these looking st bulk product pricing is the way to go. They are really good. Take it from someone who doesn’t care about all the “(fill in the blank) free” products. Bought it as a preschool wife snack contribution and they loved it and it met all guidelines. Phew!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Curry

customer_reviews.title: Great vegan nut free cookies
customer_reviews.text: These cookies are great! So far I’ve only had the snickerdoodle, but they are amazing! Similar taste to Sweet Loren’s cookie dough. Not overly sweet, loaded with cinnamon and soft like they are fresh! Heavily packaged unfortunately. S
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Making intolerances tolerable!
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of Enjoy Life products in our household, and these are no exception! I avoid gluten, dairy & soy for health issues and 3 out of the 4 people in our family are dairy-free. My 7 year old (the only one without food intolerances, yet the most picky eater) even loves Enjoy Life products, especially these cookies. We love to bake allergy friendly treats, but these are so awesome to grab on a whim! We always take our own treats to events where desserts will be served, and these always come in clutch.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: Great ginger cookies, more like fresh gingerbread cake.
customer_reviews.text: very tasty soft cookies. I love ginger crystals but they are too hot so I thought I try these since they don't have soy or high fructose corn syrup. It seems everything has at least those 2 ingredients in them. I love that these are all natural ingredients for people with food sensitivies. You can really taste the ginger in them, I even found the texture had a small piece of ginger that I detected. Since I've eaten ginger pieces before, I knew they really used ground up ginger to make these. Love, love these....they are sweet so one or two will do me.
customer_reviews.author: emerald

customer_reviews.title: Old and moldy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the variety pack. Opened them up, the chocolate chip cookies were discolored and had white-ish colored chocolate chips in them. The ginger spice cookie was beginning to mold. Waste of $20+
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Claridge

customer_reviews.title: Stale stale stale
customer_reviews.text: I love Enjoy Life’s gingerbread cookies so I ordered a S&S of a variety pack. It was a big mistake. All of the cookies were stale and thrown away. The chocolate chips were grey and had no taste. I will hunt for the gingerbread spice elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: marshav

customer_reviews.title: Cookies expire before I can eat them
customer_reviews.text: The cookies arrived on 3/7 with an expiration date of 3/23. Hardly gives me time to eat them before they expire! They taste good so that’s the only reason I’m giving them a 2!
customer_reviews.author: Tamera Caserta

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To-Snack!
customer_reviews.text: I have Celiac so gluten-free is a must for me. These soft-baked cookies are very satisfying. They go great with a cup of tea! These cookies arrived quickly and in perfect condition. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious
customer_reviews.text: Due to the pandemic I can’t get to ALDI to shop. I love their gluten free snickerdoodles. I got online to try and find something close and I’m excited to say these cookies taste exactly the same. I am a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela N Red

customer_reviews.title: I'm not disappointed. So far
customer_reviews.text: These are probably too pricey for my budget but I got them anyway. I'm not disappointed. So far, I've just tried the snickerdoodles and double chocolate brownie from the variety pack. They were delicious, soft, and almost melted in my mouth. I would have never known they were made without wheat or dairy. None of the cookies in this box were damaged either. I'm definitely going to buy again and try out all the flavors! It's so wonderful to have a treat that I can safely eat. Also, no weird after taste like I got with Lucy's hard cookies. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AlyxTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, guys@ great price and fast delivery. You made my cousin who has chrons disease and lives in a rural area very happy. She doesn't have access to alot of nice treats like this so it made her feel better!💜
customer_reviews.author: KittyMewMewNJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy cheat to make cookie truffles/pops
customer_reviews.text: Had lots of GF kids around for a party. Used the snickerdoodle and gingersnap together to make spice cake pops. Used the brownie and chocolate chip for chocolate chip cookie dough brownie bombs. You don't need as much cream cheese/frosting to get these to set since they're soft baked cookies. And it was great since it allowed us to make various pops without an oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described!! Ingredient list is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to a box. Biggest issue I have is that the ingredient list on the boxes I received do NOT match what is listed on the description on Amazon. They do include konjac flour if anyone else has problems with it like I do.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Happily Surprised:)
customer_reviews.text: Before they improved the taste, hated the chocolate brownie cookies-only ordered the snickerdoodles(really good too). Gave it another try after the improvement-luv chocolate. Delish! Keep in mind these r not Mrs Fields or the cookies my Mom made when I was a kid. Have allergies now & want to eat as gluten free as possible. Thats why I say there yummy-soft, chocolatey & have little choc chips inside. Just a little side note: for those people who made comments regarding how they get stale when opened-ever hear of baggies! If u want to keep them in the box, before placing in, when first opened wrap in a baggie. Or use a zip-lock. Anything will get stale if left unwrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn P

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for our church nursery kids. Several have food allergies and I needed something that all would enjoy so I didn't have to give out special treats. Winner winner here! All the kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Nickey Brown

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate ones taste a little weird but snickerdoodle is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I hadn’t tried these before so I ordered the variety pack. The chocolate ones tasted a little funky but still not bad. Then I tried snickerdoodle - SO. GOOD. I opted just to order that flavor the next time around.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Parten

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy Life Cookies
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly soft for a gluten-free baked good. I don’t really have any dietary restrictions but I buy these anyway because they taste so good and have a nice soft texture. I love the snickerdoodles, and the chocolate ones are good too (but very chocolate dense - meant for legit chocolate lovers only!).
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: All natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I like the soft texture and tasty flavor. Three different flavors in one package. The all natural ingredients attracts me most. Sugar level can be reduced a little.
customer_reviews.author: Dhani S.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: These cookies don’t taste terrible but they aren’t that great. They don’t really have that snickeroodle taste. My kids love them however and I love that they are allergen free.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for years. Great cookie shaped double chocolate brownies with no gluten, soy etc to mess up my day. Tastes like a regular brownie but without the serious painful consequences of a regular brownie.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies my sweet, chocolate tooth
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those Gluten-sensitive Non Celiac Disease people who is also lactose-intolerant. I avoid gluten because I feel better and keep IBS symptoms at bay better when I do. But I adore chocolate. and cookies. and soft cookies. These satisfy my need for chocolate! I will continue to keep enjoying these!
customer_reviews.author: SLP

customer_reviews.title: Delicious molasses spice cookie
customer_reviews.text: I was given these as a gift. I liked them so much that I bought them from Amazon because I didn't want to try to hunt them down in every health food section of the local markets. Waste of time and fuel. The minute the Amazon box arrived, I spotted them locally. Yes, Amazon was less expensive. I like the fact that they are so good, one is enough. There is something with the way my Glycemic index works, either with the spices or the sugars used, I was satisfied with 1or 2, I didn't need to devour a whole box. This was such an added benefit, I've cut out other varieties, they are now a household staple.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Bonazzoli

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are good. There very rich so you can only eat like two at a time. They taste like gingerbread or ginger cookies. Not at all like actual snickerdoodle but they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: carefull
customer_reviews.text: The family I am helping has a child who has severe adult allergies. Every month I get a box because these are the only cookies this child can eat without having to be rushed to the hospital. Unfortunately, twice now I have received the wrong package.
customer_reviews.author: MAT

customer_reviews.title: ... I was in desperate need to find a fast sweet snack. These cookies are great for that purpose
customer_reviews.text: As someone who just had to start a gluten and dairy free diet I was in desperate need to find a fast sweet snack. These cookies are great for that purpose. They soft and chewy. They are small but I think they're a good snack size. They are pretty sweet so I just eat 2 at a time. My package came right when I expected it and my cookies were in perfect condition. My Rankings: 1. Chocolate Chip 2. Snickerdoodle 3.Double Chocolate Chip 4. Gingerbread
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have found this product
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to have this product for a dear friends little boy who suffers from multiple food allergies. I should have read the packaging more completely because he is also allergic to chocolate, and I believe these products do have real chocolate in them. I wanted to believe they used carob chips. Does anyone know for sure? I would greatly appreciate knowing. Next time I may have to order individual boxes. The great thing is I know my friends 4 year old will be able to enjoy the other cookie flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I ordered double chocolate brownie and O.M.G they are beyond delicious 😋 I’m Gluten and Dairy free so it’s hard to find a snack that’s tasty. I recommend these 100% they are soft and has the perfect amount of chocolate. I will be ordering again soon because I don’t think these are going to last long lol Thank you for the amazing cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy Eating Enjoy Life Cookies
customer_reviews.text: I order these amazing cookies for my youngest grandson on auto ship. My grandson has a lot of allergies so I hated to give his other siblings regular cookies and have to tell him he could not eat those cookies. So when I found these I was so excited to offer him these Enjoy Life cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: To die for cookies
customer_reviews.text: For someone who can't eat soy or peanuts or anything that has been contaminated by them, finding these cookies was a dream come true. They are softbaked and delicious! I was surprised. Considering the ingredients, I was expecting them to taste like dates or something "health-foody". SOOOOOO not the case. They taste like real cookies and that is what I love about them! :)
customer_reviews.author: H. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Soft baked goodness
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! They're a soft baked cookie so if you like that you'll love these. Vegan or not these cookies have been a hit with everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I use to buy these at my local Kroger but I can’t find them anymore. I love the flavor & they fill you up & are so satisfying
customer_reviews.author: nenny paige

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these cookies
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these cookies. They are so tasty and I would love them even if I didn't have to eat gluten free and corn free. I have Celiac's Disease and a corn allergy (plus a couple of other allergries) so there are very few off the shelf products I can eat which is healthier for me but not convenient or easy. When I'm going somewhere that dessert or treats are going to be served I grab some of these and I'm happy and fine instead of the potential feelings of envy or self-pity.
customer_reviews.author: Ejmedwards

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Simple Mills gluten free cookies are better tasting but they might not have the same allergen content. These don't taste very good to me, but everyone has different preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Love all the flavors
customer_reviews.text: Love all the flavors, and although they are gluten free, egg free and nut free, these don't taste like other cookies where you taste the rice in it. These just taste fantastic. The chocolate tastes like chocolate and the ginger tastes like ginger cookies should, too. So grateful! They've been a real treat for my son who has allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Yum!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for grandson that has allergies and he looooves them. Cant say enough good things about the Enjoy life brand because their products taste good enough to eat even if you dont have allergies. Very tough to find good tasting products that are dairy and nut free so dont know what we would do without these!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: One of my special needs son's has a LOT food allergies. Allergen free food is flipping expensive. If it wasn't for the many deals I could get here on Amazon, I am not sure what we would do. He likes all the Enjoy Life Cookies - both the soft and the crunchy. I've taste tested them all - and even though I do not have food allergies - I have found the cookies to be quite tasty. Enjoy Life makes several foods he enjoys - but cookies are his favorite!
customer_reviews.author: RDHarris

customer_reviews.title: Delicious GF cookies
customer_reviews.text: These cookies are delicious! You would never guess they are GF. I just wish they were bigger cookies, or more in package.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Gluten-Free foods have come a long way
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a group of friends who can't/don't do gluten or dairy...they said the cookies are "super moist and very flavorful, almost cake like".
customer_reviews.author: V. Martin

customer_reviews.title: These are.... okay
customer_reviews.text: Due to nursing a baby with severe food allergies I was on a very restricted diet for about 10 months. When I found the Enjoy Life brand I was SO excited. These cookies are just alright. I prefer the Hard Chocolate Chip Cookies over the Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies (in the Enjoy Life brand). The taste on these is definately not like a regular chocolate chip cookie, it has a bit of an after taste. But if you're diet is limited, or you have a gluten, dairy, or other allergy they are a good alternative for a sweet treat. I do LOVE the Enjoy Life chocolate chips, though! They sell these by the bag.
customer_reviews.author: SMH1106

customer_reviews.title: Ok for gluten free
customer_reviews.text: It was ok didn’t realize I ordered this and not the small snack packages for students ... didn’t like all of the flavors
customer_reviews.author: rachel hayes

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Gluten Free Cookies
customer_reviews.text: melt in your mouth goodness. Gingerbread is the absolute ginger cookie I think I ever had! Price is excellent too. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Bettybakebake

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Gluten Free Cookies!
customer_reviews.text: These cookies are so very tasty! They are smaller than I had anticipated, about the same size as a brownie bite. Super soft and so full of flavor. The snickerdoodle ones are my favorite but all of the varieties are delicious! It's great to have found a gluten free cookie that is this good.
customer_reviews.author: HopeinWA

customer_reviews.title: For people with many intolerances!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! I have many, many intolerances and it’s hard to find desserts I can eat, especially ones that taste good. I am addicted to these! It has a rich taste and is soft and fluffy. I love these and total recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Sanders-Eachus

customer_reviews.title: My kids like it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has so many food allergies, we are so happy to find this brand. The cookies are delicious. We subscribe so we can have every month in our home. I also love their chocolate bars.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: awesome gluten free cookies
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite chocalate chip,double chocolate , there is only the one i dont like is the snickadoodle cookies tooo spicy.
customer_reviews.author: patty curry

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy Life Soft Cookies + Saltine Cracker = Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Personally I hate them on their own. They taste sort of like candy corn, and I do not like candy corn! This might sound strange, but eating the cookie with a salty cracker on top (I use Saltines), it tastes delicious and not like candy corn or too sugary at all! I am happy I found this trick because at first I was upset with the taste. I also like to flatten out the cookie and then stack one saltine cracker on it, and eat it like a cookie sandwich type thing. I guess the salt balances out the sugar. This might be weird, but for me it works!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a case and they expired 5/8/20
customer_reviews.text: The cookies don't taste that fresh and are due to expire in May. Chocolate chips are whitish. I wouldn't have bought a whole case had I known they were going to expire so soon.
customer_reviews.author: SKT

customer_reviews.title: Quite Good
customer_reviews.text: These cookies were nice and soft and had a really good flavor. You could tell they used quality ingredients. The perfect desert.
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn Thingelstad

customer_reviews.title: Good for gluten free
customer_reviews.text: My grandpa recently discovered a gluten allergy. He LOVES sweets and we wanted to help find him some cookies he could have. He likes these and so does my grandma.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbo33

customer_reviews.title: Used to be my go-to
customer_reviews.text: Liked the texture and flavor better before the change. Doesn't matter though because I can't eat them now that they have Sorghum and likely more Buckwheat flour than before. Also not a fan of the "natural flavor". Super sensitive to msg and natural flavor is a common term to hide that ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: B-Dawg

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS AND SOFT!  VERY ALLERGY FRIENDLY.
customer_reviews.text: OK, I just received these today and had to jump on here to leave a review. They are D-E-L-I-C-I-O-U-S!! I am allergic to gluten, eggs and dairy. Enjoy Life to the rescue!! These are soft baked and oh-so-soft. It will be hard to resist eating an entire box in one sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Taunya R.

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: My stepson loves these. He'll eat a whole box at once if you let him. He's celiac so these are perfect when you don't have time to bake. Our grocery store only has one kind so this was a treat for him.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Great variety pack for Subscribe and Save
customer_reviews.text: Ordering this on subscribe and save makes the price better than what is normally in stores. The variety helps keep it interesting and as more of a reward for my Top-8 allergic son. The best part about Enjoy Life products (besides being safe for him to eat!) is that they taste so good, other kids will ask to have them and enjoy them just as much as my son. This can help him feel included without "punishing" the other kids, as everyone gets to have the same treat. My son's school orders these for Halloween parties/etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super tasty but not filling
customer_reviews.text: Our family of 7 has been eating these cookies for a decade. They're soft and super tasty, but not filling in the least. Our kids love them, and when you're gluten and dairy free you only have so many options, so we continue to buy them. But they're more of a "treat" sort of cookie to put in with their lunch. Not really a snack cookie. I could eat an entire box and not feel satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Colleen

customer_reviews.title: I will be ordering more
customer_reviews.text: So delicious and very soft these are my favorite snacks when I want something sweet to eat 😋😊
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: If you're in need of a good soft baked cookie
customer_reviews.text: If you're in need of a good soft baked cookie, this may be exactly what you need. In addition to being delicious, it's also gluten free, top 8 allergy free, vegan, and more. We use these in our bakery, Free and Friendly Foods, and as well as in projects for our blog, foodandlego.com.
customer_reviews.author: The Allergy Chef

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE! I’m so addicted to these cookies. Sucks that 2 cookies is considered a serving 120cal. In the pic I already ate 5 of the cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Likyoon

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Soft Cookies
customer_reviews.text: I love these soft cinnamon cookies. They are perfect with a cup of coffee. The Enjoy Life brand of products has been a lifesaver since I’ve gone gluten-free (allergy).
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Bullard

product_meta.title: Enjoy Life Soft Baked Cookies Variety Pack, Soy Free, Dairy Free, Non GMO, Gluten Free, Vegan, Nut Free Cookies, 6 Boxes
product_meta.description: Style:Cookies| Flavor:Variety Pack| Size:6 Ounce (Pack of 6)For great-tasting, nut-free cookies that let you eat freely, choose this Enjoy Life Soft Baked Cookies Variety Pack, including Chocolate Chip, Double Chocolate Brownie, Snickerdoodle and Gingerbread Spice flavors. These all-natural cookies are made with nutrient dense ancient grains that are finely milled into a well-balanced flour blend. The soft vegan cookies in this cookie variety pack are made in a dedicated nut-free and gluten-free facility and are free from 14 common food allergens, including dairy, egg, tree nuts, peanuts and soy, resulting in a great-tasting snack that you can trust and love. Non-GMO Project Verified and certified gluten-free, vegan, kosher and halal, these cookie packs are the perfect worry-free snack. Made with premium, free-from ingredients, Enjoy Life Soft Baked Cookies are allergy-friendly snacks that give you permission to eat freely.
feature_bullets: Contains (1) Enjoy Life Soft Baked Cookies Variety Pack including 2 boxes (6 oz each) of Chocolate Chip and Double Chocolate Brownie, and 1 box (6 oz each) of Snickerdoodle and Gingerbread Spice
Nut-free soft cookies made with nutrient dense ancient grains finely milled into a well-balanced flour blend for a deliciously soft texture in every bite
Gluten-free cookies that are free from 14 common food allergens, including wheat, eggs, dairy, and soy
Certified vegan cookies are Non-GMO Project Verified and certified gluten free, kosher and halal for worry-free, all-natural cookies

All Enjoy Life products are gluten free, wheat free, peanut free, dairy free, tree nut free, soy free, casein free, sulfite free, egg free, lupin free, sesame free, fish free, mustard free, crustacean free, and shellfish free

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
